int osc_page::ops_from

An offset within page from which next transfer starts.

This is used by cl_page_clip() to submit partial page transfers.

Definition at line 341 of file osc_cl_internal.h.

Referenced by osc_page_clip(), osc_page_init(), and osc_page_submit().
